name: Pick-Possuming
description:
You are a crooked critter. One of the feral felons making lives hard with their animalistic antics. Only, you use your skills of criminal cunning to help out the unfortunate and underprivileged animals suffering under the thumbs of the corrupt power hungry humans. It's your job to stop them.

Pick-Possuming is a 2d6 TTRPG about "trash" animals committing crimes to help out their fellow creatures in their suffering against the terrible humans. Inspired by media such as Leverage, The Bad Guys, and Robin Hood 3-5 players can step into the paws of raccoons, opossums, coyotes, bears, rats, and skunks to steal, hoodwink, and swindle the humans out of the ill-gotten goods gained from the damage they've done. 

This game is currently in "In Development" for reviews and feedback, and any while any payment is appreciated as a tip it is not expected.
